__e: I just got paired up with this book keeping guy who told me a story about accounts receivable.
To work together for something besides killing,... ..to be close to someone without always having to protect your back...
But I'll tell you, after that experience, if I ever have to be hitched to someone, it would be you.
And when it is over, we will have a world united and at peace for the first time in human history.
I think everybody's such a tight-knit group and know how to work well together.

It will be known that he is at once brother and father of his children, son and husband of his mother. That he has slept with the woman who was his father's. And that he, he alone is his father's murderer.
And it's clear that our own destiny is linked to theirs.
And the girl doesn't know if she's going to be able to open up to her boyfriend because she's so close to her brother.
Hadn't the faintest notion that soon his name would be inexorably tied to mine.
